title: Part 5318 - Independent Testing Laboratories
content:
Part 5318 - Independent Testing Laboratories

State Regulations
§ 5318.1 - Use of independent testing laboratories
§ 5318.2 - Licensing of independent testing laboratories
§ 5318.3 - Additional standards for issuance of a casino vendor enterprise license to an independent testing laboratory
§ 5318.4 - Notification and reporting requirements
§ 5318.5 - Conduct and operation
§ 5318.6 - Testing and certification results

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
